text:
Knockout Views, Rocking Dj and Balmy Asian Nights at The Ritz-Carlton Abu Dhabi, Grand Canal
The Ritz-Carlton Abu Dhabi, Grand Canal celebrates the arrival of the balmy season with a launch of a spectacular outdoor Lounge by Li Jiang – a stylish venue tucked away in a manicured olive garden and offering breathtaking views of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. The newest addition to the thriving night scene of Abu Dhabi, the Lounge by Li Jiang brings together Pan Asian cuisine, creative beverage list and relaxed ambience enhanced by the venue’s open air setting. Resident DJ Margo Sahara sets the tone for the night with her signature beats.
An enticing new menu created by the Singaporean Chef Lee Zhi Zhong exclusively for the terrace, features signature Southeast Asian dishes such as otak wrap with kataifi and Macau sauce; savoury golden Chinese bun with minced chicken sauce; Vietnamese duck spring roll and soft-shell crab with Thai dressing, mango and chili.
With striking interiors by an award-winning Japanese designer Super Potato, Li Jiang resembles a traditional Asian market where an open kitchen is the hub of a busy and energetic environment of vibrant colours and Oriental aromas. The décor is characterized by the use of natural elements such as reclaimed wood, locally-sourced mud plaster and clear glass creating a neutral palette that acts as a background for the pops of colour.
Situated on the scenic Grand Canal overlooking the majestic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, the 57-acre waterfront luxury hotel offers a wide choice of luxury accommodation options including 85 private villas and four Ritz-Carlton Suites offering spacious facilities and premium amenities.
